p: All of the 85 participants who randomly selected in the study (55 men and 30 women) were locals. The participants were belonged to two pastoralism types i.e. nomadism (43%) and sedentary pastoralism (57%). The focus was on older generations as the holders of traditional knowledge. Therefore, 98% of the participants were more than 45 years old and 60% were over 60 years old (Table 1).
